 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲבַטִּחִים‎</span> **noun [masculine] plural** ==water-melons== (Mishna <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אבטיח‎</span>, Samaritan <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; compare [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>No. 297</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhMwAmAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAzACYAAAKahI+pe8EP43JN2qtc0LhfvVEeJErlSIYnyhohsGFrC7vz89KJ2uU6EvMEf7ohsWU8opKTm7JmWzGfrmjSR628mNNmZOabOndjmHTILZOsRpUbxBu9Y27zHK4m4zkNev6DlTX2hgOy1GVmV9eXuAS4WJWVESj350UDOYHzQ9nX2SjJthnq+UUqdNpjmYqYqsflCnT3eUoYextRAAA7"> etc.; perhaps loan-word in Hebrew compare [[BDB#Sta|Sta]]<sup>§ 258</sup>; modern Egyptian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ba‰‰ich, bi‰‰ich***</u></abbr> compare references in [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[Num.11.5|Num 11:5]] on formation compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 10</sup>, who compare Ethiopic <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***aq‰ala***</u></abbr>) — Egyptian fruit, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָא‎</span> [[Num.11.5|Num 11:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִקִּשֻּׁאִים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ֶהחָצִיר‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבְּצָלִים‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשּׁוּמִים‎</span>); [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">τοὺς πέπονας</span>.
